Handyman Services

NO JOB TOO SMALL | I'M HERE TO HELP

I offer a wide range of handyman services to meet all your home repair and maintenance needs.

Plumbing

Leaky faucets (no more water torture!), toilet/sink/shower installation, and more.

Electrical

Light bulb replacement (because reaching those high ceilings is hard), light fixture replacement (brighten up your life!)

Flooring

Click flooring installation/repairs (gap-free floors, yay!)

Roofing

Roof patching (don't let the rain get you down...or in)

Carpentry

Trim/moulding installation (fancy walls, anyone?), window/door installation/repairs

Outdoor Services

Yard cleanup (we'll make your yard look better than your neighbor's, sorry not sorry), shed cleanup/repairs (from messy to mesmerizing!)

Siding

Siding repair and installation (protect your home from the elements!)

And More...
